entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -39.4°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -43.5°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 44. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 36. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 38. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
